page.title: 06BROWNIES.
page.content: I used to be a{Brownie, }it was great, we played {rounders} on the playing field and all sorts of other games inside. We paid {10}pence each week for {subs,}if someone was away the place was covered with a {disc } with {A}on. When we went in every week we did a {registration ring}when every body stood in a ring and you said yes when your name was called and then sat down. Some days we worked on a certain {badge}like {cooking}and{ {entertainment}it was really good. When we went home, again we stood in a ring, joined hands, and sang{Brownie {Bells}.Then afterwards we said a { {Prayer }together before going home.
